data.author: Max Beckett

changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.0 includes:
-Configurable things (locations, units)
-A brand new user interface, being more easy to read and better looking
-Bug fixes involving units and display
-Optimisation, code now more compact and with less errors

Thanks for sticking around and I hope you enjoy this update.
- Fixed an issue with the wind section. Enjoy!

Version 1.5 out now!

This update includes:

- Beta version of the new UI (home screen only)

- Updated card content to remove N/A errors

- Summary and cloud card now includes precipitation (if there is any)

And more!

As always, thank you all for the support, if you have a question or bug find, don't hesitate to send me an email.

- Added location feature

At last, the location feature we've all been waiting for.
To access this, simply hold select on the main screen.

Coming up - configurablity - select which 3 locations you want!

As usual, don't hesitate to email me with questions or bug reports.

- Added humidity in the temperature section
- Added highs and lows in the temp section
- Added visibility in the cloud section
- Cleaned up code. Now 150 lines shorter than 1.1.

- Moved summary item to top of all menus
- Fixed 'undefined' bug

data.description:
NOW IN VERSION 2.0!
NEW UPDATE INCLUDES
- Configurability
- A new interface
- Optimisation and bug fixes

3Weather is an intuitive watchapp designed to give you technical weather details at your wrist. Designed with pilots in mind, this app includes temperature, pressure, wind, cloud, and a summary of them all. Weather at your wrist has never been so easy.

Note: This project is still a work in progress. Please don't hesitate to contact me via the support email below if you have found any bugs, glitches, or something that shouldn't happen. Also, until I have decreased memory usage, this app may be a little slow on the menu screen. Enjoy.

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 2.0 includes:
-Configurable things (locations, units)
-A brand new user interface, being more easy to read and better looking
-Bug fixes involving units and display
-Optimisation, code now more compact and with less errors

Thanks for sticking around and I hope you enjoy this update.

data.title: 3Weather
